findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of user funds.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The YIN smart contract has an unprotected mint function which can lead to unauthorized token creation.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is declared as internal and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The 'swapTokensForDividendToken' and 'swapAndSendYinDividends' functions are private but unprotected, allowing potential unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of contract state.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function is not protected, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor of the DividendPayingToken contract has no access modifier specified, making it unprotected and accessible by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have any access control or protection, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is not protected and can be exploited by unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is accessible and can be exploited by an attacker to drain the contract's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _setupDecimals function
findings.description: The _setupDecimals function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the contract's decimal settings.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function is not protected and can be accessed by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.
